span.p: Due to the recommendation by Governor Beshear, Morgan County Schools will continue to utilize Nontraditional Instruction (NTI DAYS) to complete the 2019-2020 school year that will end on TUESDAY MAY 12th, 2020.

a.title: Click to read more about: SUPERINTENDENT MESSAGE 4/10/2020

span.p: During this pandemic the Morgan County School District is complying with the Governor's closures and allowing our staff to work from home as much as possible. Please call Central Office at 606-743-8002 to set up an appointment for assistance. We apologize for the inconvenience this is causing however we want you to know that we are doing our best to keep you safe just as much as our staff.

img.alt: safety tipline, online prevention. stop bullying, violence, risky behavior

div.p: The Morgan County School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs or activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. Inquiries may be directed to Mrs. Leann Sargent, Title IX Coordinator or the Section 504/ADA Title II Coordinator at 155 University Drive, West Liberty, KY 41472 - 606.743.8002
